textBox.richText: Well if you’re up for a party Montreal is the place to be. Our weekend in the second largest city in Canada proved to be a blast. Saturday saw the addition of Lora and her boyfriend Colin to take our tally to nine crazy souls in the ‘City of Saints’. We resisted the temptation to visit many of Montreal’s male entertainment establishments but managed to find enough entertainment to keep us occupied during the evening. We especially had a great night at Carlos and Pepe’s (authentic Montreal cuisine) and thought their choice of music was uncannily familiar. Culture was on the cards for Sunday’s activities and to get our fix we headed to St Joseph's Oratory of Mont Royal. Word is that its dome is the second largest of its kind (100 points who can name the first!!).
